item.content:encoded:
[bt_section layout="boxed" top_spaced="not-spaced" bottom_spaced="not-spaced" skin="light" full_screen="no" vertical_align="inherit" divider="no" back_image="" back_color="" back_overlay="" back_video="" video_settings="" back_video_mp4="" back_video_ogg="" back_video_webm="" parallax="" parallax_offset="" animation="" animation_back="" animation_impress="" posts_category="popular, news-trending" posts_author="" show_prev="" show_sticky="" el_id="" el_class="" el_style=""][bt_row][bt_column width="1/4"][bt_image image="3690" caption_text="" caption_title="" show_titles="no" size="full" shape="square" hover_type="btDefaultHoverType" url="/main-demo/home/home-2/" target="_self" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_image][bt_hr top_spaced="topSmallSpaced" bottom_spaced="not-spaced" transparent_border="noBorder" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][bt_header superheadline="" headline="Standard layout" headline_size="small" headline_style="regular" dash="no" subheadline="" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_header][bt_hr top_spaced="topExtraSmallSpaced" bottom_spaced="bottomExtraSmallSpaced" transparent_border="border" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][bt_text]
Perfect for most of the websites you could need, with lots of categories and examples laid out.

el_style=""][/bt_hr][bt_text] <blockquote>For the redesign of our local news sites we were looking for a new theme for over 3 months. Decided on Bold News Theme because of the features (flexible customization options re: bold builder) and the great design (selling point!). Promising options for development and quite impressive speed results were counting too. Despite that decision to purchase was based on great design, the main reason for our rating is very responsive support requested NEW features have been implemented over few days (filtering via custom taxonomy) and the Bold team is very open to suggestions on developing the product. So the experience with the product itself as well as with relation with author is a prime one. Really enjoying it and hoping for an extensive development of the theme ;).</blockquote> [/bt_text][bt_hr top_spaced="not-spaced" bottom_spaced="bottomSmallSpaced" transparent_border="noBorder" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][/bt_column][/bt_row][bt_row][bt_column width="1/1" align="left" vertical_align="btMiddleVertical" border="no_border" cell_padding="default" animation="animate animate-fadein" highlight="no_highlight" background_color="" transparent="" inner_background_color="" background_image="" el_class="" el_style=""][bt_hr top_spaced="topMediumSpaced" bottom_spaced="bottomMediumSpaced" transparent_border="border" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][/bt_column][/bt_row][bt_row][bt_column width="3/4" align="left" vertical_align="btMiddleVertical" border="btRightBorder" cell_padding="btDoublePadding" animation="animate animate-fadein" highlight="no_highlight" background_color="" transparent="" inner_background_color="" background_image="" el_class="" el_style=""][bt_hr top_spaced="not-spaced" bottom_spaced="bottomSmallSpaced" transparent_border="noBorder" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][bt_text] <blockquote>Despite getting used to the new builder tool (vs Visual Composer) this theme works extremely well for my client. It loads very quickly and the I like the sidebar for categories. As a newbie designer there are some things I wish would be easier like a Main Theme options in the WP Dashboard vs having it in Customize area. But i highly recommend their customer support because of their prompt response time and helpfulness! Thank you BoldThemes!</blockquote> [/bt_text][bt_hr top_spaced="not-spaced" bottom_spaced="bottomSmallSpaced" transparent_border="noBorder" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][/bt_column][bt_column bottom_spaced="bottomSmallSpaced" transparent_border="noBorder" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][bt_text] <blockquote>Beautiful-looking theme with loads of options to personalise to our specific needs. We are yet to go live with our first site, but our initial impressions are all very positive and we are confident it will look far superior to the theme we currently use. The developers have also been very helpful and we look forward to building multiple sites with Bold News over the next year.</blockquote> [/bt_text][bt_hr top_spaced="not-spaced" bottom_spaced="bottomSmallSpaced" transparent_border="noBorder" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][/bt_column][/bt_row][/bt_section][bt_section layout="boxed" top_spaced="topSemiSpaced" bottom_spaced="bottomSemiSpaced" skin="inherit" full_screen="no" vertical_align="inherit" divider="no" back_image="4266" back_color="#f1f1f1" back_overlay="" back_video="" video_settings="" back_video_mp4="" back_video_ogg="" back_video_webm="" parallax="" parallax_offset="" animation="" animation_back="" animation_impress="" posts_category="" posts_author="" show_prev="" show_sticky="" el_id="" el_class="" el_style="box-shadow: 0 0 50px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;"][bt_row][bt_column width="1/1" align="left" vertical_align="inherit" border="no_border" cell_padding="default" animation="animate animate-fadein animate-moveleft" highlight="no_highlight" background_color="" transparent="" inner_background_color="" background_image="" el_class="" el_style="position: relative; z-index: 10;"][bt_image image="4271" caption_text="" caption_title="" show_titles="no" size="boldthemes_small_square" shape="square" hover_type="btDefaultHoverType" url="" target="_self" el_class="" el_style="pointer-events: none; position: absolute; right: -50px; top: -90px; width: 220px; height: 220px; transform: rotate(-15deg); z-index: 1;"][/bt_image][/bt_column][/bt_row][bt_row][bt_column width="1/2"][bt_header superheadline="" headline="Save time, use Bold Builder!" headline_size="extralarge" headline_style="regular" dash="bottom" subheadline="Best practices on the market collected in one page builder" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_header][bt_hr top_spaced="not-spaced" bottom_spaced="bottomSmallSpaced" transparent_border="noBorder" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][bt_text]
Comes integrated with Bold News theme. Features drag and drop interface, loads of content elements, clipboard functionality and has the fastest user interface around.<strong>By far.</strong>
Give it a try and let us know how YOU feel about it visit its page on <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/bold-page-builder/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">WordPress.org</a>.
[/bt_text][bt_hr top_spaced="not-spaced" bottom_spaced="bottomMediumSpaced" transparent_border="noBorder" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][bt_button text="GIVE BOLD BUILDER A TRY" icon="" url="https://wordpress.org/plugins/bold-page-builder/" target="_blank" style="Filled" icon_position="Right" color="Accent" size="Medium" width="Normal" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_button][bt_hr top_spaced="not-spaced" bottom_spaced="bottomSmallSpaced" transparent_border="noBorder" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][/bt_column][bt_column width="1/2"][bt_hr top_spaced="not-spaced" bottom_spaced="bottomSmallSpaced" transparent_border="noBorder" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][bt_text]

I have lots of hoodies, but none is as cool as this one!
Perfect Hoodie for a Ninja!
